com.facebook.buck.core.rules.resolver.impl

Class SingleThreadedActionGraphBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.rules.AbstractBuildRuleResolver
      • com.facebook.buck.core.rules.resolver.impl.AbstractActionGraphBuilder
        • com.facebook.buck.core.rules.resolver.impl.SingleThreadedActionGraphBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionGraphBuilder, BuildRuleResolver

    public class SingleThreadedActionGraphBuilder
extends AbstractActionGraphBuilder
    Provides a mechanism for mapping between a BuildTarget and the BuildRule it represents. Once parsing is complete, instances of this class can be considered immutable.

        public Optional<BuildRule> getRuleOptional(BuildTarget buildTarget)

      • computeIfAbsent

        public BuildRule computeIfAbsent(BuildTarget target,
                                 Function<BuildTarget,BuildRule> mappingFunction)
        Description copied from interface: ActionGraphBuilder
        Retrieve the BuildRule for the given BuildTarget. If no rules are associated with the target, compute the rule using the given supplier and update the mapping.
        Parameters:
        target - target with which the BuildRule is associated.
        mappingFunction - function to compute the rule.
        Returns:
        the current value associated with the rule

      • requireRule

        public BuildRule requireRule(BuildTarget target)
        Description copied from interface: ActionGraphBuilder
        Retrieve the BuildRule for the given BuildTarget. If no rules are associated with the target, compute it by transforming the TargetNode associated with this build target using the TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer associated with this instance.

      • requireMetadata

        public <T> Optional<T> requireMetadata(BuildTarget target,
                                       Class<T> metadataClass)
        Description copied from interface: ActionGraphBuilder
        Retrieve a piece of metadata for a target. This metadata is computed via MetadataProvidingDescription.createMetadata(com.facebook.buck.core.model.BuildTarget, com.facebook.buck.core.rules.ActionGraphBuilder, com.facebook.buck.core.cell.CellPathResolver, T, java.util.Optional<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<com.facebook.buck.core.model.BuildTarget, com.facebook.buck.versions.Version>>, java.lang.Class<U>).

      • addToIndex

        @Deprecated
public <T extends BuildRule> T addToIndex(T buildRule)
        Deprecated. 
        Please use computeIfAbsent instead

      • getParallelizer

        public Parallelizer getParallelizer()
        Description copied from interface: ActionGraphBuilder
